gov.va.med.lom.javaBroker.util

Class Format

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.lom.javaBroker.util.Format

  • public class Format
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for formatting numbers that follows printf conventions. Also implements C-like atoi and atof functions

    • Constructor Summary

        Returns:
